svtools module¶

Module containing functions to parse files output by magnetic field models.

Part of the MagPy package for geomagnetic data analysis. This module provides various functions to read SV files output by geomagnetic field models.

svtools.calculate_residuals(obs_data, model_data)[source]¶

Calculate residuals between model and observatory data.

Use datetime objects to ensure that we have both an observatory SV value and a model prediction for each date in the analysis, and that these values are located in the same position within their respective dataframes

svtools.calculate_sv(obs_data, mean_spacing=1)[source]¶
